post.body: PS El Jalapeños.. Sunday night .. 7 p.m... 1313 West 117th St in Cleveland. taken I-90 to W117th and go north. Spread word
dude... I could tell you some stories. Benjamin Button is worth it, but see Slumdog Millionaire first.
that sucks!
yesterday store wise was a tragedy.. in three years I think yesterday was only the 2nd day i didn't like our customers at all
that's an awesome movie. People never take me up to rent that when they ask for a good movie.
what movie are you talking about? .. oh and have a safe trip.. don't spend too many loonies!
such a great movie! Hope the little ones feel better soon.
are you still drunk?
retweet: @chrisseper Wow. Bice Ristorante in Tower City has closed.
i've always heard eskimos have 26 different words / terms for 'snow' .. waking up I think I used one of them.. 'WTF?!'
Benjamin Button: a good, solid movie. a celebration of life. and a reminder, sometimes we don't enjoy life or loved ones as much as we could
going to be anti-social and go see Benjamin Button alone at VView... people are tricking me out today
felt bad for my coworkers so stayed an extra hour at work. finally heading home.. I may need a drink when I get home.
goddamn.. what the hell is up with people these past few days? self centered and psycho just begin to describe what we've been experiencing
Had lunch 2x today. Early lunch at Nate's on W25th w/good friends. just finished smaller lunch at La Brasa on W62 n Dennison w/family. Full!
how the heck does the PDealer pick Tropic Thunder the fourth best movie of 2008?! at least they got #1 rigtht: http://tinyurl.com/76bbfe
'Cheaters' is such an awesome show. It literally is the only reason I have rabbit ears on my television
went to see Milk. Good movie. Great performance by Sean Penn. . . and Harvey Milk was/is a hero.
For the record, I am not going to Mexico. I secured tix for 4 fam members.
Scored a $522 round trip ticket to Mexico City leaving mañana. Just took my entire lunch hour to do it.
